skins.shipDescription: Hatsuharu-class destroyer number three C Wakaba.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Wakaba, third ship of the Hatsuharu-class~ Just like my big sisters, my name has a connection to spring~ That time Hatsushimo rammed into me? It was pretty awful because she's just so cute... Yep! Cute! I'll bring her along next time!
skins.acquisition: Howdy-ho! Good morning, Commander! I'm Wakaba, third ship of the Hatsuharu-class~! Huh? It's not morning? Look, don't fuss over all the details~!
skins.login: Commander, good mo... *Eek*?! Didn't I tell you to quit fluffing my tail?!
skins.details: Comb it~ Make it slick~ *Giggle*~ I gotta take good care of my tail every day~
skins.secretaryIdle2: I heard that yesterday, you... *Giggle*, it's not like I love gossip or anything, okay? I've just got pretty big years, you know? That's all~
skins.secretaryIdle3: I bet you wanna fluff my tail, don't you, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you need to focus on your work.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You're gonna ruffle up my tail...

skins.shipDescription: Yaho~ Good morning, Commander! For a limited time only, Wakaba Claus will be delivering Christmas presents! Huh? My bag? Aaahhh! C-Commander, help me pick everything up!
skins.acquisition: Yaho~ Good morning, Commander! For a limited time only, Wakaba Claus will be delivering Christmas presents! Huh? My bag? Aaahhh! C-Commander, help me pick everything up!
skins.login: Good morning, Commander! Mind helping me look for a missing Christmas present? I somehow ended up short one...
skins.details: Even if I'm busy giving out presents, I have to keep my tail in good condition~
skins.secretaryIdle1: There's nothing wrong with winter. It just means that spring is right around the corner. Hehe~!
skins.secretaryIdle2: My ears are just as sharp on Christmas! Hehe, Commander, want to help me listen in on what everyone wants for their present?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Since I'm in a festive mood, I wouldn't mind letting you pet my tail~
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you have to focus on your work. Just like I have to focus on delivering these presents―
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hey, don't use this as an excuse to rub my tail!
